curated tools for modern builders

Resources I trust when building products, revenue engines, and automation.

Every tool here has shipped with me in the trenches—helping teams prototype faster, understand their customers, and grow responsibly.

🧱

No-Code & Codeless Builders

Launch experiments and internal tools without writing a line of code. These platforms let GTM teams ship production-grade experiences fast.

  • Webflow

    CMS-grade site builder with granular design control.

  • Bubble

    Full-stack web apps with workflows, auth, and database baked in.

  • Softr

    Airtable-powered portals and customer dashboards.

  • Glide

    Mobile-first apps built from spreadsheets.

  • Zapier Interfaces

    Simple front-ends tied directly to automation flows.

🧠

Engineered & Coded Apps

When performance and custom UX matter, these frameworks and services form the backbone for modern SaaS shipping cycles.

  • Next.js

    React framework for hybrid rendering and production velocity.

  • Astro

    Content-heavy sites with islands architecture and blazing load times.

  • Supabase

    Postgres, auth, and storage managed for product teams.

  • Prisma

    Type-safe ORM that keeps your schema and app in sync.

  • Railway

    Infra as a service for fast backend deployments.

🤖

AI Stack & Co-Pilots

Augment teams with AI for research, copy, ops, and product velocity. Each tool has proven ROI across launches and lifecycle programs.

  • OpenAI GPT-4o

    Enterprise-safe reasoning model to co-draft content and strategy.

  • Anthropic Claude

    Context-heavy AI assistant for research and compliant workflows.

  • Perplexity

    Fast competitive intelligence and trend scanning with citations.

  • Midjourney

    Visual ideation for campaigns, product mocks, and ads.

  • ElevenLabs Voice

    Voiceovers for product explainers and onboarding walkthroughs.

⚙️

Automation & Ops

Connect revenue tools, trigger lifecycle moments, and orchestrate data hygiene with automation that scales gracefully.

  • Zapier

    Highest coverage automation directory for GTM stacks.

  • Make

    Visual builder for multi-step workflows and branching logic.

  • n8n

    Self-hosted automations when compliance or custom nodes matter.

  • Airtable

    Operational database that GTM teams actually enjoy using.

  • Notion

    Source of truth for playbooks, briefs, and knowledge sharing.

📬

Marketing & Lifecycle

From acquisition to retention, these platforms create personalized journeys and measurable revenue impact.

  • HubSpot

    Unified CRM + marketing automation for scaling teams.

  • Klaviyo

    Lifecycle messaging powerhouse for ecommerce and B2C SaaS.

  • Braze

    Customer engagement platform built for high-volume personalization.

  • Mutiny

    No-code personalization for conversion experiments.

  • Customer.io

    Event-driven automations for product-led growth motions.

📊

Analytics, Measurement & Experimentation

Ship smarter by closing the loop on attribution, retention, and product usability with instrumentation that scales.

  • Mixpanel

    Product analytics for funnels, cohorts, and usage insights.

  • Amplitude

    Growth teams rely on it to uncover activation and retention levers.

  • PostHog

    Open-source product analytics with built-in experimentation.

  • Looker Studio

    Fast reporting dashboards for marketing & revenue ops.

  • Snowflake

    Data cloud for centralizing first-party data and modeling CLV.

🎓

Expert Learning & Communities

Stay sharp with programs and communities that keep GTM, product, and leadership skills compounding.

  • Reforge

    Advanced programs for product, growth, and marketing leaders.

  • Lenny’s Newsletter

    Signal-rich stories on product and growth strategy.

  • Product Marketing Alliance

    Curriculum and peer network for PMM practitioners.

  • Demand Curve

    Highly tactical growth playbooks and community support.

  • Superpath

    Content marketing guild with templates, briefs, and jobs.
